summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GoGarvis file upload feature. All backend APIs (14/14 tests passed) and frontend UI elements working correctly. File upload, text extraction, chat with attachments, and file deletion all functional.
critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper data-testid attributes for testing
File type validation is correctly implemented on both frontend and backend
Text extraction from TXT/MD files works correctly
Image files correctly skip text extraction
Chat with file attachments properly sends file_ids and receives context-aware responses
test_credentials: None required - file upload endpoints are public
seed_data_creation: Test files created during testing were cleaned up
context_for_next_testing_agent: File upload feature fully tested. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_file_upload.py cover: TXT upload, MD upload, PNG upload, JPG upload, multiple file upload, invalid file type rejection, file info retrieval, file deletion, chat without files, chat with text file, chat with multiple files. Frontend UI verified: upload button, file input, drag & drop zone hint, file preview with remove button, chat input, send button, clear button all working.

backend_apis: POST /api/chat/upload - Single file upload (TXT, MD, PNG, JPG)
POST /api/chat/upload - Invalid file type rejection (400 error)
POST /api/chat - Chat with text file attachment
POST /api/chat - Chat with multiple file attachments
frontend_ui: Hidden file input with correct accept attribute (.png,.jpg,.jpeg,.webp,.pdf,.txt,.md)
Drag & drop zone hint text displayed
File preview appears after upload with filename and size
Remove file button (X) on file preview
Send button sends message with attachments
Attachment indicator shown on user messages with files
text_extraction: PNG/JPG images - no text extraction (expected behavior)
